::Hot Rod::

"Ok, Savanna, lets get the scum bag. Beast mode!"
Hot Rod transformes to his "bat" mode, and comes after Hell Beast.
Once Hot Rod spots him, he launches two rockets at him.
"I'm sending you back to hell, you piece of SHIT!"
